p: We used Schoener's D to compute the overlap between current and future climate suitability of threatened plant species based on the occurrence localities of each plant across all nature reserves as well as all the plant species belonging to each nature reserve ( Warren, Glor & Turelli, 2008; Rödder & Engler, 2011). D is an ideal method for computing niche overlap from climate-based ENMs ( Rödder & Engler, 2011). Here, we computed D in ENMtools 1.4.4 with values ranging from 0 (species that have completely discordant climate niches) to 1 (species that have identical climate niches; Warren, Glor & Turelli, 2008; Warren, Glor & Turelli, 2010). Detailed information on the D statistic is provided by Warren, Glor & Turelli ( 2008) and Warren, Glor & Turelli ( 2010).
